message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $15,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We're offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special price of $14,000. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the product's worth and your interest in it. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
